fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 1654: Satan and no more than 3 other members will always spawn.
- Factional chat
- Factional kill 
- The Town will be notified what Sins spawned at the start of the game.
- All members have detection immunity and Basic defense. 
- Members lose their detection immunity when the first of Satan's contracts is accepted, their defense when the second is, and their factional kill when the third is.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Devolve the town into sin and chaos, eviscerate all who would try to banish you or Satan.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Devolve the town into sin and chaos, eviscerate all who would try to banish you or Satan.
